access_level.desc: The level that we are setting the file's permission to (read or write).

emoji.desc: Emoji tag to apply to the link.

entity_id.desc: ID of the entity being bookmarked. Only applies to message and file types.

type.desc: Type of the bookmark i.e link.

errors.access_denied: Actor lacks access to the requested resource.
errors.cannot_bookmark_from_external_org: File is an external file and cannot be bookmarked.
errors.cannot_bookmark_restricted_sharing_enabl: File has restricted sharing enabled and cannot be bookmarked.
errors.file_already_added: The file has already been added to the folder.
errors.invalid_app_action_type: App action type is not valid.
errors.invalid_emoji: Invalid emoji, does not follow the pattern of a valid emoji name.
errors.invalid_entity_id: Invalid entity_id, file or message type bookmark should have original file or message ID.
errors.invalid_link: Invalid link, link should begin with either http:// or https://.
errors.not_implemented: bookmarking not available for the user.
errors.parent_bookmark_disabled: Parent bookmark feature flag is off.
errors.parent_with_link: Parent bookmark should not have link.
errors.permission_denied: No permission to perform this operation.
errors.slack_connect_file_upload_sharing_blocke: Admin has disabled File uploads in all Slack Connect communications
errors.slack_connect_clip_sharing_blocked: Admin has disabled Clip sharing in Slack Connect channels
errors.slack_connect_blocked_file_type: Files with certain extensions are blocked from being uploaded in all Slack Connect communications
